docs.title: Welcome to ForestMQ Docs
docs.text:
Message Queue built on libevent

⚠️ Production ready in v1.0.0

docs.title: Project Status
docs.text: 🎉 ForestMQ is now usable for test / hobby projects or the curious.

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
The quickest way to get ForestMQ is by using Docker.

docker run -p 8005:8005 josefdigital/forestmq:0.6.5

docs.title: Clients*
docs.text:
• ForestMQ Python client forestmq-python
  • ForestMQ Go client (WIP) forestmq-go

*More clients will be available soon for Javascript / Typescript, Dart & C.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• TCP ✅
  • amqp-v2.0 🛠️
  • Multiple queues TODO
  • Message acknowledgement TODO
  • Message durability / persist TODO
  • exchange types (e.g. fan) TODO
  • Logging ✅
  • Docker ✅
  • Daemon ✅
  • Topics TODO
  • MacOS distribution with brew TODO
  • Linux distribution with snap TODO
  • Message encryption TODO
